projects.name: UNFAMILIAR
projects.text: Unfamiliar is a relaxing fantasy adventure game where you take the form of a cat-witch who sets out to acquire magic ingredients from storybook worlds to craft items and create enchanting costumes.

projects.name: GOOGLE SHEETS UNITY INTEGRATION
projects.text: GoogleSheets Unity Integration is a tool I created during my time at ManaTea. The tool creates instances of objects from rows in a google sheet and populates the values of those objects with from columns in the spreadsheet

projects.name: DIVIDE
projects.text: Divide is a turn-based strategy game set in a cyberpunk dystopia whilst moving along a hex grid.

projects.name: SPECTRAL MAFIA JAM
projects.text: Spectral Mafia Jam is the result of a 60 hour game jam conducted at AIE. it is a top down twin stick shooter featuring complex camera movement, multi-functional character control and custom AI.
